turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how are you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm good. How are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, thanks for asking, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you please help me with placing an order at Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great and what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one, I would like pepperoni. On the second, I would like sausage and onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the third, I would like a chicken barbecue pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And on the fourth, I would like pepperoni and black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 4 medium thick crust pizzas one pepperoni, one sausage and onions, one chicken bbq pizza and one pepperoni and black olives for $34.99, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. For the price though, I wanted extra cheese on these pizzas. Will that up the price?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be $35.50 instead.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and you'll get the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much for all of your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No worries, have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. You too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks, bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
